content: Is there any blanket option to give the modules of grind more time? We have a case in the RISC-V model where a grind proof seems to fail because some horrible nesting of conjunctions just seems too deep for grind (deleting a few of the clauses makes it work again)
The relevant details are in docs#Lean.Grind.Config. Maybe grind (splits := 10) or something would work?
Hm, then I need to investigate further. I already increased all of the config options
